website_summaries.verdict: The iconic Air Max line remains to be a yardstick in the 2015 model where great aesthetic appeal and decent performance go. Nike never fails to stretch the boundaries between performance and lifestyle, particularly in this model. While it is undeniably a great-looking shoe, it offers decent cushioning and responsiveness only. The arch support is moderate with a less than average traction. It lacks the performance of a shoe carrying a $200 price tag.
pros: The seamless construction and a plush inner sleeve take the runner for miles and miles of comfort in the Air Max 2015
One of the best-looking shoes in the market, according to most runners
There is a noticeable smoothness in the transition, based on several reviews
It is significantly lighter than the previous model
A good number mentioned that the midfoot wrap is better than the earlier version of the Air Max
Reflective materials in the logos for low-light running
The 2015 version of the Air Max has gender-specific flex grooves
cons: Durability is not enough considering the price range, as mentioned in many comments
Traction could certainly be a lot better noted a handful

customer_reviews.title: I received replicas. Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: First of all, seller says he was from New York. Actually ships from China. So, right away I had a gut feelings these were going to be replicas. Turns out, I was right. I bought two pairs and both were replicas. Everything about them was fake. The Black/White Bright Cremson Blue replica was not even close to being original, nor was the White/Bright Crimson-Black. Another key thing is the shoes smelled like cement, authentic Nike Air Max 2015's do not. I attached pictures of the box I received, and from the box of an authentic pair I bought from FinishLine. Huge difference and one of the easiest ways to identify replicas.
customer_reviews.author: Juan Nunez

customer_reviews.title: terrible condition
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are scuffed, ripped, worn out and dirty!! They are not new as described. They have clearly been worn many times before. This is unacceptable!!!
customer_reviews.author: Juli Rios

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and great looking
customer_reviews.text: These look great and fit as expected. The heal was pushing a little on my achilles for half the day but did loosen up throughout the first day. The color on the toe isn't as black as the rest of the shoe, but doesn't look bad, just an FYI

customer_reviews.text: This one feels almost as if it was not made by Nike. Too narrow and too short for the size and severely hurts my feet and toes. Haven't used it more than twice from sever pain - too bad I never had a return option.

customer_reviews.title: ... first time to order overseas & the experienced was great! The product (Nike Air Max 2015) arrived much ...
customer_reviews.text: It’s my first time to order overseas & the experienced was great! The product (Nike Air Max 2015) arrived much earlier than expected. It was in good condition (no scratch as in brand new) & fits just right. My husband was so happy. I hope the next time we order would be the same experience again.

customer_reviews.title: But for $145 I did expect a better quality shoe being that the Air Max 2015 that ...
customer_reviews.text: I have a pair of the same shoes in white/grey sz 11 and these shoes that I purchased are not a sz 11. The shoe fits but the toe area is a little narrower and shorter. I noticed that the box is from a Nike factory store and maybe that's why because shoes purchased there do have minor flaws/defects. But for $145 I did expect a better quality shoe being that the Air Max 2015 that I purchased.( price for a model of shoe that two years old)

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes. These Nike shoes are the only model I wear as they provide excellent support for my feet. I am a heavy person and these shoes provide the arch supported and comfort I need. The only complain I have is they are a bit pricey, but I have found them to be less expensive here at Amazon. This is my fifth par. Out of all the five, I only had one pair that blew the air bubble but this was about after two years. I will continue to buy these shoes as long as they continue to provide excellent support.

People always notice them as well. Sweet looking shoes.

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected for the price.
customer_reviews.text: The shoe is expensive for the performance you receive. I bought these to use in the weight room on non leg/back days and be able to do a 1 to 1.5 mile run after. They are too heavy to run in. I will not wear them anymore for running. I also figured that the sole would be softer, but it is not.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: These sneakers are attractive and comfortable. We walk everyday and these shoes are perfect! This is our second pair. Although, when the sneakers wear out, the bottom rubber breaks the air pocket seal. Ensuring the recommended 1 year or less sneaker replacement.

customer_reviews.title: Really liking these sneakers
customer_reviews.text: Not a runner but I wear these sneakers daily. I only buy Nike and these are my favorite so far. They are very light and comfortable and look great with a pair of jeans. I've had the Air Max 2012 & 2013. Skipped the 2014's since I wasn't a fan of the styling. These really don't require much break in. They were very comfortable out of the box.

product_meta.title: Nike Air Max 2015, Men's Trainers
product_meta.description: Maximum cushioning for an unstoppable run the nike air max 2015 running shoe puts plenty of soft, flexible cushioning between you and the unforgiving ground for an exceptional comfort throughout your run. Flexible cushioning the full-length max air unit delivers excellent cushioning with enhanced flexibility for smoother transitions through your footstrike. Breathable comfort the ultra-plush, seamless engineered mesh upper provides lightweight comfort to help keep cool. It's been simplified and refined for an enhanced flexibility and a more lightweight ride. Supportive fit dynamic flywire cables integrate with the laces and wrap your midfoot for an adaptive, supportive fit.
feature_bullets: nike air max 2015 mens running trainers 698902 sneakers shoes
